entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING ENDED, London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:01 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.9°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches developing in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
